title: Sportradar CEO, Carsten Koerl
itunes:title: Sportradar CEO, Carsten Koerl
description:
This Wednesday on Business of Sports, Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch discuss sports data and technology with Carsten Koerl, founder and CEO of Sportradar, a global company that provides real-time sports data and betting odds to major sports leagues and sportsbooks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
This Wednesday on Business of Sports, Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch discuss sports data and technology with Carsten Koerl, founder and CEO of Sportradar, a global company that provides real-time sports data and betting odds to major sports leagues and sportsbooks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
